<a id="PackedDataContainerRef"></a>

# PackedDataContainerRef

**Deprecated:** Use [@GlobalScope.var_to_bytes()](@GlobalScope.md#@GlobalScope_method_var_to_bytes) or [FileAccess.store_var()](FileAccess.md#FileAccess_method_store_var) instead. To enable data compression, use [PackedByteArray.compress()](PackedByteArray.md#PackedByteArray_method_compress) or [FileAccess.open_compressed()](FileAccess.md#FileAccess_method_open_compressed).

**Inherits:** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

An internal class used by [PackedDataContainer](PackedDataContainer.md) to pack nested arrays and dictionaries.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

When packing nested containers using [PackedDataContainer](PackedDataContainer.md), they are recursively packed into **PackedDataContainerRef** (only applies to [Array](Array.md) and [Dictionary](Dictionary.md)). Their data can be retrieved the same way as from [PackedDataContainer](PackedDataContainer.md).

```
    var packed = PackedDataContainer.new()
    packed.pack([1, 2, 3, ["nested1", "nested2"], 4, 5, 6])

    for element in packed:
        if element is PackedDataContainerRef:
            for subelement in element:
                print("::", subelement)
        else:
            print(element)
```


Prints:

```text
    1
    2
    3
    ::nested1
    ::nested2
    4
    5
    6
```
